resources.string: There is no such custom level. Use numbers between %s and %s
There is no such built-in level. Use numbers between %s and %s
Please enter number into edit field.

Please click what to do next: Overwrite for replace level on given position, Shift rest to insert level on given position and shift other levels, Append to append level on end of levels or press BACK to change number.
Custom level was saved with ID %s
Every bubble must have neighbor! Cannot save.
Forwarding you to Market to get you Frozen Bubble...
Press OK, if you wish to delete custom level with ID %s.
Press DELETE ALL if you wish to make your own levels from scratch.
If you wish to delete just one level, write it\'s number into edit box and select DELETE again from menu.
Failed to delete custom level with ID %s
Cannot find Android Market! Please install Frozen Bubble manually.

Note that if Frozen Bubble is already running in background, it can start from custom level 1 instead of wished one. If this happens - press BACK button in Frozen Bubble and restart it from editor with wished level once more.
Starting level must be number between 1 and %s
You have to have at least 15 custom levels saved to proceed.
This is the first time you are running this level editor for Frozen Bubble. Do you wish to see the tutorial how to work with this editor?
Press menu to rate this level pack
Rating for level pack was updated
Rating for level pack was submitted

Frozen Bubble Level Editor will allow you to further extend joy of playing Frozen Bubble. Editor comes packed with 40 custom levels that you can play right away! By simple finger-drawing you can create your own levels. Get inspired by loading original levels, or make new ones from scratch. Created levels can be afterwards played in original Frozen Bubble. Editor and game cooperates together thanks to Pawel Aleksander Fedorynski, author of Android\'s port of Frozen Bubble. After you\'re done creating, upload your creations to server for other users. They can download and play your level packs. Let\'s see who is the most creative one ;)
What would you like to do with it.
This is how the application uses the permissions:

string-array.name: permissions
string-array.item: ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - This tells the app whether it has the access to Internet
INTERNET - Download and upload of data from the Internet

string-array.name: change_log_data
string-array.item: 1.4.0 - new graphics, saving bug fixes, minimum 15 levels for upload
1.3.0 - Slovak translation added - when using SK locale
1.2.1a - permissions explained in About screen
1.2.1 - SD card install (Android 2.2 devices), bug fixes
1.2.0 - Slovak translation added - when using CS locale
1.1.0 - User cannot save same level more than once. Cleaned redundancies in level packs. Some changes in GUI
1.0.5 - Filter by minimum levels in pack option added to download screen.
1.0.4 - Some small improvements in code
1.0.3 - Fixed error when user tried to load default level 101 (which doesn\'t exist anyway)
1.0.2 - Minor bug fixes - patched some more special cases Force Closes
1.0.1 - Patched Force Close during saving of level if user previously deleted all levels
1.0.0 - Unlimited download feature. Rating of levelpacks from overview screen is possible.

- Upload is here. From now on, you can upload your creations to server, so later anybody can download and play them. Also new theme was created, using more colors than default android\'s GUI items. Download feature coming soon ;)
- Level overview feature added into menu options, tutorial button moved to "About screen"
- On first run dialog with tutorial is shown
- Better options for starting Frozen Bubble - start from custom level X, continue with custom levels progress and continue with default levels progress, minor fixes.
- Droid & Tatoo support greatly improved. Pop-up message with ID of level saved shows after saving.
- Tutorial added for better understanding how to work with application. Change log and application number are shown in About screen.
- Problem with HW keyboard sliding solved, Frozen Bubble menu option now reacts on Enter and center key.
